channel.title: Problems running a downloaded server
channel.description:
ok im new at this stuff, i downloaded teh server, used winrar to unzip, opened moparscape, changed port to the one needed for server(3030), went into folder where i saved server, clicked run server, went back to moparscape and hit start server and tried to log in.
It then loads gives me the start up messages in chat bar, then ends up on log in screen again. i need help.

item.title: Problems running a downloaded server
